UserrssAction

Formatting of RSS handled by Rss10Action

This class represents a notice stream from a given user and contains interfaces to retrieve and describe it.

Variables

  • tag - default none; contains a hashtag we’re using to filter the feed, if any
Summary
doStreamPreparationPrepare RSS stream, process tag variable
getNoticesRetrieve the notices for the user timeline represented by this userrss object
getChannelReturns a description of the timeline we’re presently on, in this case user timeline
initResoverride parent to add X-SUP-ID URL
isReadOnly

doStreamPreparation

protected function doStreamPreparation()

Prepare RSS stream, process tag variable

Parameters

  • none

Returns

  • void

getNotices

protected function getNotices()

Retrieve the notices for the user timeline represented by this userrss object

Parameters

  • none

Returns

  • array containing all the notices

getChannel

function getChannel()

Returns a description of the timeline we’re presently on, in this case user timeline

Parameters

  • none

Returns

$carray containing url, title, link, and description

initRes

override parent to add X-SUP-ID URL

Parameters

  • none

Returns

  • void

isReadOnly

function isReadOnly($args)

Parameters

  • array $args - ignored

Returns

  • boolean true
